Simple Syrup

Servings: Makes about 8 ounces

Time:

Ingredients

  • ¾ cup sugar
  • 5 ounces warm tap water

Equipment

  • Liquid Measuring Cups
  • All-Purpose Whisks

Recipe Notes

  1.  This syrup can be refrigerated for up to 1 month. Shake well before using.

Instructions

  1. Whisk sugar and warm water together in bowl until sugar has dissolved. Let cool completely, about 10 minutes, before transferring to airtight container.
